com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.documentstore

Class ExternalDataFileDownloadServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.i2group.apollo.documentstore.DocumentStoreServletBase
          • com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.documentstore.ExternalDataFileDownloadServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Servlet, ServletConfig

    public class ExternalDataFileDownloadServlet
extends com.i2group.apollo.documentstore.DocumentStoreServletBase
    Represents the servlet that enables downloads from external data sources through HTTP GET. The content of a downloaded document is returned as part of the HTTP response.

    The request must include a documentId parameter whose value is interpreted using the encoding specified with the request. If an encoding is not specified, then the download servlet uses UTF-8 to interpret the parameter value.

    If the documentId has an invalid format, then the HTTP response will include status code 400.

    If the documentId does not exist, then the HTTP response will include status code 404.

    Example

    This is an example of a HTTP request that would download a document, together with a possible response: 
     GET http://localhost/daod/services/dadownload?documentId=0000014a-299e-c2cb-91dc-d35ecdb11c10 HTTP/1.1
 Host: localhost
 Connection: keep-alive
 Accept: */*
 User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0
 Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, sdch
 Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.8
 
 HTTP/1.1 200 OK
 Date: Mon, 08 Dec 2014 12:18:48 GMT
 Server: IBM_HTTP_Server
 X-Powered-By: Servlet/3.0
 Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=downloaded
 Cache-Control: private
 Cache-Control: max-age=3600
 Content-Length: 4750838
 Keep-Alive: timeout=10, max=100
 Connection: Keep-Alive
 Content-Type: application/x-download
 Content-Language: en-GB
 
 All's Well That Ends Well Shakespeare homepage | All's Well That Ends Well | Entire play ACT I
 SCENE I. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
 Enter BERTRAM, the COUNTESS of Rousillon, HELENA, and LAFEU, all in black 
 COUNTESS 
 In delivering my son from me, I bury a second husband.
 BERTRAM 
 And I in going, madam, weep o'er my father's death
    Since:
    6.0
